price: Dan (Kami telah mengutus) kepada kaum ʻĀd saudara mereka, Hūd.  Ia berkata, "Hai kaumku, sembahlah Allah, sekali-kali tidak ada Tuhan bagimu selain dari-Nya.  Maka mengapa kamu tidak bertakwa kepada-Nya?"
arabic: ۞ وَإِلَىٰ عَادٍ أَخَاهُمۡ هُودٗاۚ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنۡ إِلَٰهٍ غَيۡرُهُۥٓۚ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-ilā ʿādin akhāhum hūdan qāla yāqawmi uʿ'budū al-laha mā lakum min ilāhin ghayruhu afalā tattaqūna
